text: @ScottPresler @CPAC Rest in the meantime and take care of yourself. I'm on my 2nd round of pneumonia in the last five months. The first time lasted for 2 months. Drinks lots, ramp way up on Vitamin C and rest as much as possible. Prayers for healing! Thanks for all you do!
